### Hello there, my name's Philip.

### üë®üèª‚Äçüíª &nbsp;About Me

ü§ì &nbsp;I'm a huge nerd, and love learning about anything tech.\
ü©ª &nbsp;I'm currently learning how to fix healthcare equipment (Biomedical Engineering Technology).\
üîå &nbsp;I'm a [Red Seal](https://www.red-seal.ca/eng/about/pr.4gr.1m.shtml) Journeyperson Electrician.\
üå± &nbsp;In my free time I like to detach from tech and garden or go hiking, or run Audio-Visual at Front of House for live events!\
üí¨ Got a question or just curious about something? Feel free to ask!

### <p align="center">‚öôÔ∏è My development environment </p>

> My father was an early tech adopter, and I grew up with Windows PCs (my first video-game memory is watching him make a real-time flight at night in Microsoft Flight Sim 95!) It‚Äôs my day-to-day operating system, where I make use of everything from software like Fusion360, Illustrator, Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) and the Windows Terminal, and relax with EVGA-powered gaming adventures.
